name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen Recorder, Webcam Recorder - Dubb Video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Break communication barriers with personalized, trackable video messages sent via Gmail, Outlook, LinkedIn, SMS, and more.

The Dubb Chrome Extension lets you create trackable screen recordings to communicate your ideas through video effectively. 

Professionals in sales, marketing, business development, customer service, and more use Dubb to add video personalization to their communication, increasing client happiness and sales growth.

With the Dubb Chrome Extension, you can effortlessly create and share:

- Personal video greetings
- Product demos
- Prospecting videos
- Presentations

Here are the key benefits of using Dubb:

- Personalize communication using video
- Provide trackable video messages to determine what's effective
- Increase overall email reply and engagement rates
- Increase sales rates
- Boost referral rates

The Dubb Chrome Extension lets you record, share, and track authentic video messages! With features like an AI writing assistant, teleprompter, annotation tool, customized landing page, and interactions via Gmail, Outlook, and LinkedIn, you can increases your connections, conversations, and conversions by 30-300% today! 

Install the Dubb Chrome extension to get started. Your clients are waiting. 

Learn more at https://dubb.com
